biotools.summary: Tool for inferring ancestral state using S-DIVA (Statistical dispersal-vicariance analysis), Lagrange (DEC), Bayes-Lagrange (S-DEC), BayArea, BBM (Bayesian Binary MCMC), BayesTraits and ChromEvol.
